title: Chest for quest... NO KEY?
body: WTH riot, why u trying to make me buy keys to open a chest u give from a quest...... pathetic... back to FORTNITE!

replies.body:
Keys are free and tend to outnumber chests for most players..

{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
ya I have ZERO keys, FORTNITE IS WERE ITS AT. This game is a dying game! PEACE

na.. really? w/e gave u that idea.
